title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 4700.10 - Fees
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 4700.10 - Fees

State Regulations
(a) No fee shall be
charged for inspection of records, search for records or certification of the
records. (b) A fee, not exceeding 25
cents per page, for photocopies, not exceeding 9 x 14 inches, of records shall
be imposed by the authority. (c) A
fee for photocopies, exceeding 9 x 14 inches, of records shall be imposed by
the authority; the exact amount of such fee shall be determined by the records
access officer, based on his analysis of the cost to the authority of
photocopying such records, except when a different fee may be otherwise
prescribed by law. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
4700.10

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
